io.leonis.zosma.game.rule

Interface OutOfBoundsRule<I extends Field.Supplier,O>

  • Type Parameters:
    O - The type of object which can violate the rule.
    All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.function.Predicate<I>, Rule<I,O>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BallOutOfBoundsRule, PlayerOutOfBoundsRule

    public interface OutOfBoundsRule<I extends Field.Supplier,O>
extends Rule<I,O>
    The Class OutOfBoundsRule. This class describes the rule in Small Size League soccer which determines whether an object inside the sequence state is out of bounds.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface io.leonis.zosma.game.Rule

        Rule.SetSupplier<G,A>

        Determines whether a supplied object is out of bounds.
